https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ttmd7bUIddiox4TToW7moX4Bclw.jpg When 13-year-old Tommy loses his parents to a drug raid, he turns to a phone sex operator (his fairy godmother) for help as he embarks on an urban odyssey to escape foster care with his two best friends. 1-800-HOT-NITE
